page.title: 18A YOUNG MAN
page.content: A YOUNG MAN ___________ We asked a young man what he thought of our area and this was his reply. "There is a great deal of unemployment in the area and finding a job is very difficult.I will probably have to move away to a bigger city to have any hope of a job.There is hardly anything to do during the evenings other than the youth club during the Winter months.We could do with a sport centre in the area because the nearest is 5 miles away in Bangor and to catch a bus every time is expensive.I would like to see the youth club open throughout the year so that young people can have somewhere to go.We seem to be ten years behind the time here."
